actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-744, by Mr. Cardoza.

The rule waives all points of order against consideration of the bill except clauses 9 and 10 of rule XXI. The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Natural Resources now printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in part A of the report, shall be considered as an orginial bill for the purpose of amendment.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 245.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1317.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.Res. 1317, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote announced the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Hastings (WA) demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question on H.Res. 1317 until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 185 (Roll no. 480).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 182 (Roll no. 481).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1286) to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Washington-Rochambeau Revolutionary Route National Historic Trail.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1286) to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Washington-Rochambeau Revolutionary Route National Historic Trail.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1286) to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Washington-Rochambeau Revolutionary Route National Historic Trail.
